Title: Floor & Decor Holdings
Manager: BofA  Merrill Lynch/ Barclays/ Credit Suisse/ UBS Securities
CO_managers: Goldman, Sachs/ Jefferies/ Piper Jaffray/ Wells Fargo Securities/ Houlihan Lokey
Business: Founded in 2000, Floor & Decor is a high-growth, differentiated, multi-channel specialty retailer of hard surface flooring and related accessories with 72 warehouse-format stores across 17 states. We believe that we offer the industry’s broadest in-stock assortment of tile, wood, laminate and natural stone flooring along with decorative and installation accessories at everyday low prices positioning us as the one-stop destination for our customers’ entire hard surface flooring needs.
